page.title: 19Houses in Lydlinch
page.content:
It would appear that there has been little new building in the village for some 20 years.
There are 2 small groups of council houses,{Platts Close}and{Orchard Close consisting of 10 and 12 houses respectively.A resident said she thought that about half of them were now privately owned.
Up the lane towards the church there are to fairly new bungalows and two converted barns otherwise these buildings have changed little since the 2nd War.
According to the Electoral register there are some 300 adults living in the area we have covered.
